name: You Are A Badass - Textured Chevron Teal, Blue & Yellow
description:
Celebrate someone's triumph whether it's a baby, new job or they graduated from school! It'll sure make them smile!

>>You Are A Badass<<
Printed with the finest resolution & inks
On 110 lb cotton bright white cardstock
Comes with a blue envelope

>>Details<<
Card & Envelopes are A2 size.

>>Other Tidbits<<
Mailed with a piece of recycled paper/cardboard to prevent from bending!
Not seeing the quantity you'd like? Just press on that contact button right over there, we're happy to accommodate any number in between. No project is too small or large!
Expedited shipping is available. Please let us know if you are running on a deadline.

name: Custom Pinback Buttons - Set of 150 1 Inch (Small) Buttons
description:
Hey! So, you're interested in ordering custom buttons from Buttonlandia? That's excellent!! Buttons are perfect for promoting bands, your Etsy shop and business. They are awesome for weddings and other party events! The possibilities are endless...really.
*MORE PICS available upon request*

>> 150 Custom Pinback Buttons <<
Hand pressed with love, care & attention
Made in the U.S. with genuine American Button Machine products
Professionally printed with color laser on bright white paper
Made with mylar top coating and a spring pin back. Other options are available for backings. 
We can also include individual packaging for an added on price.

>> Artwork <<
One custom design or design set up is included in the listing price (If you'd like more than one design, send us a message!)
We are happy to make you a custom design from scratch! (We suggest simple text or photo for 1" size). Send us a message regarding your ideas, photos or any other particular requests for your buttons
If you already have your design & would like to place it into a template, please send us a message. Artwork is recommended to be at 300 dpi
We will send you a proof before buttons are pressed! 

>> The Work Behind The Buttons <<
As you can see by our feedback, we are happy to help you with your needs. We're fast responders to messages and orders. We try to have a lightning fast turn around time (typically pressed within two days once proof is approved & then shipped off). Communication is kept throughout the process. We love hearing about our customer's stories & feedback. Our doors are always open! You will receive true graphic design talent, open communication & the same loving effort throughout.

>>Shipping<<
Amounts of 100 to 200 for 1" buttons will be shipped in a USPS Small Flat Rate box for domestic shipping. 

>> Other Tidbits <<
Not seeing the quantity you'd like? Just press on that contact button right over there, we're happy to accommodate any number in between. No project is too small or large!
We have worked with non-profit agencies in the past. As we are artists ourselves, at this time we cannot donate buttons. However, we offer a reasonable discount for non-profits and organizations. (Must have a tax ID to qualify.)

Expedited shipping is available. Please let us know if you are running on a deadline.

name: Hello Beautiful - Handwritten Handmade Pocket Mirror
description:
A mirror that gives a little bit of confidence! Stash this little (2.25") mirror away in your purse or travel bag. It is truly an uhhh-mazing mirror!
These make great (inexpensive) gifts for any occasion. Order multiples if you are hosting a shower, party...These are especially popular for bridesmaids gifts!

Every person needs a little bit of confidence now and then. We know everyone is beautiful in their own unique way...We just want to spread the word of beauty! Tell your friend or loved one just how beautiful they are. We guarantee once they open the package, they will smile AND thank you!

Black ink doesn't strike your fancy? Look at these colorful customizable pocket mirrors here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/110747981/customizable-hello-beautiful-pocket

>>Hello, Beautiful!<<
Hand pressed with love, care & attention
Made in the U.S. with genuine American Button Machine products
Made with mylar top coating and a mirror back
2.25" Size
We wrap these puppies in a drawstring Muslin bag (see 4th pic)

>> Other Tidbits <<
Not seeing the quantity you'd like? Just press on that contact button right over there, we're happy to accommodate any number in between. No project is too small or large!
Expedited shipping is available. Please let us know if you are running on a deadline.

name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Best Friends - Set of Handsewn Plush Toy
description:
Celebrate your friendship, love, kinship, with a set of two adorable pieces of bread! They are perfect for any age & any occasion! Place these cuties in a nursery, office, living room, kitchen, pretty much anywhere.

Not only do we love PB&J but we also love our best friends. Which include our mom (super cheesy, huh?)! We really wanted to celebrate closeness & all the good things that come with it (like long talks, awesome presents, amazing hugs, etc.) We love hearing stories about these cuties. People have used them for ring bearer pillows (AWW), to frame in shadow boxes, as a proposal prop (SUPER AWW), etc. What's your story for giving these PB&J?

This set of breads are adorable to the max! They are lovingly made with Eco Fi Felt (100% recycled from post consumer plastic bottles) and embroidery thread. PB&J are hand sewn and cut. They are stuffed with Poly-Fil. Best Friends PB&J are approx. 4.5" (H) x 3.5 (L) x .5 (W). They are close to the actual size of real pieces of bread. They both feature a heart; one red (jelly) & one orange/brown (pb). 

Please allow 2-3 days to make from your purchase date. If you are in need of them earlier please send us a message!
